title: Bhalla Papri Chaat
body: Savoury dumplings topped with crisp gram flour flakes, assorted chutneys and yoghurt.

title: Onion Bhaji
body: Onion coated in a mildly spiced gram flour batter, deep fried and served with tamarind chutney.

title: Gol Guppe
body: A popular street snack of India. Hollow crisp poori filled with tangy, spicy chutneys.

title: agra Pattice
body: Pan fried potato cakes stuffed with grated cottage cheese, topped with chickpeas and hung yoghurt.

title: Jaipuri Bhindi
body: Shredded okra marinated in batter of gram flour and species , fried until crisp.

title: Achari Murgh
body: Chunks of chicken marinated in traditional North Indian pickling spices and grilled to perfection.

title: Chilli Garlic Chicken
body: A spicy preparation of boneless chicken stir-fried. Indian soul food.

title: Shami Kebab
body: Pan grilled kebabs of ground lamb and lentils, stuffed with coriander chutney.

title: Shrimp Peri Peri
body: Shrimps stir fried with spring onions, red and green peppers.

title: Wada Pao
body: Potato patty in bun with coriander chutney and red chilli flakes.

title: Punjabi Samosa
body: Crisp flour patties filled with choice of mashed vegetables, served with tamarind chutney.

title: Dahi Batata Puri
body: Lentil puffs with a tangy mixture of potatoes and black peas, finished with sweetened yoghurt, mint and tamarind chutney.

title: Chole Bhature
body: A traditional fried bread served with spicy chickpeas and chopped red onions.

title: Chilli Paneer
body: Cubes of cottage cheese in chilli garlic sauce and finished with chopped spring onions.

title: Murgh Kaleji Masala
body: Chicken liver sauteed with onion, tomato, cumin seeds and coriander.

title: Kheema Samosa
body: Spicy lamb mince cooked with chopped celery, stuffed in a savory pastry fried until crisp.

title: Amritsari Macchi
body: Batter fried fish, marinated in lime and caraway seeds, served on a bed of spicy chutney.
